title: IHC seeks progress report regarding fixation of ‘roti’, ‘naan’ price in capital
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 20 (APP):The Islamabad High Court (IHC) on Monday sought progress report from the district administration on a petition regarding consultation with ‘naanbai’ association for fixation of price of ‘roti’ and ‘naan’ in capital.

Justice Arbab Muhammad Tahir adjourned the hearing of the case while seeking a progress report from the respondents.

During the hearing, the district administration’s lawyer told the court that negotiations between the Islamabad administration and the Naanbai Association on the issue of prices are ongoing and another round is expected between the parties today.

The court, seeking a progress report on the negotiations between the parties, adjourned the further hearing of the case till a later date.
